programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: A Dangerous Household
programme.desc: Bobbie says that her daughter Cindy’s home was filled with so many dangerous animals that she was forced to report her to child protective services because she felt her grandchild was in danger. But Cindy says Bobbie has another agenda!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Are My Husband and Daughter Having Sex?
programme.desc: Holly says her mother is envious of her and has made up accusations that she has been sleeping with her stepfather; Jovanni reacts to his girlfriend's ironclad proof that he is cheating.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Mommy, Go To Jail For Me
programme.desc: In order to avoid charges, Christi abandons her ten year old daughter and leaves the state. Her daughter wants to give her one last chance to take responsibility and be in her life.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: He Beat Me In My Sleep/He Pulled A Gun On Me
programme.desc: Amber may not be the best mother, but her abusive boyfriend Alex is making their relationship and her son's upbringing, even worse. Then, David is desperate to get his kids back from ex-wife Fawn, who alleges David was an abusive father.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Young Mothers Accused of Abuse
programme.desc: Anthony believes his ex, Erica and her new boyfriend Jeremy are abusing his son. Next, Lacey is being accused, by her aunt, of physically abusing and neglecting her two young children.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Is My Wife A Prostitute
programme.desc: Jesus is worried that Sonja is sleeping with other men in exchange for Cocaine. Then, Jessica is desperate to change Josh's controlling and abusive ways. She says she can no longer live with Josh if he's going to continue threatening her and accusing her of prostitution.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Beat Her Because She's Fat
programme.desc: Wade constantly accuses Angela of cheating on him and admits to beating and berating her. Angela is desperate for the abuse to end. Then, Stacy wants to prove to her boyfriend that she hasn’t been cheating on him with a lie detector test!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Stole 15 Years of My Life
programme.desc: Jennifer claims she was sexually abused by her stepfather Allen and moved in with her best friend’s family to protect herself. 15 years later, her mother wants a second chance, but Jennifer is hesitant. Can Steve help mend this broken relationship?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Was I Sold For Drugs?
programme.desc: As a child, this young girl was left by her mother to be raped by an older man in order for her to get drugs.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: 4 Suspects: Who Will Fall?
programme.desc: On August 5th, Amber’s 7 month old daughter was taken by police after cigarette burns were found all over her body. Amber’s mother, Vickie, found the burns and called the police, but who actually burned her?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Failed Five Times?
programme.desc: A man takes a lie-detector test after being accused of hurting his girlfriend's child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Abusive Mom Takes Lie Detector Test
programme.desc: This mother is trying to regain custody of her daughter which she was convicted of abusing and neglecting. But Steve will not let her even get close to that child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Want Him To Love Me
programme.desc: Mindy wants Michael to step up to the plate, be a father, and help support his child. His new girlfriend Tanya also wants Michael to be involved in his child's life, but after hearing the lie detector results, she too might question her man.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Why Are You Dating A Child?
programme.desc: Sheila fears that her teen grand-daughter is having sex with a 26-year old family-friend. Then, Jaquella started dating her boyfriend Shaquille when he was a teen. Shaquille's mother is here to confront Jaquella for sleeping with her child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: She's Not Pregnant, We Never Had Sex
programme.desc: Heather received a message from Alisha saying that she was pregnant with Remondo's baby but Remondo is Heathers boyfriend! Plus, Silvina and Clee'chaun have been in a relationship for almost 10 years and they've never met in person!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: A Family Ripped Apart
programme.desc: Katrina says she was molested by her step-father as a child. Katrina says that when she told her mother Phyllis, she not only forgave him, but stayed with himI And there's more... Katrina says after telling Phyllis, he continued to molest her!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Chose the Abuser over Your Kids
programme.desc: Jackie and her children live with a registered sex offender; accused of touching his own son, Ronnie takes a lie-detector test and demands a DNA test too.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: 5 Years of Abuse, Is He the Father?
programme.desc: Ashley’s boyfriend Tyjuan thinks his abuse is justified because he suspects her of cheating and doubts the paternity of their five kids! Then, Natasha gave birth two weeks ago, but fears that the father is her rapist and not her husband Daniel!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: If He Fails, This Stage Won't Be Enough
programme.desc: Police informed Latoya that her husband was accused of molesting her daughter. She immediately kicked him out, but feels torn. Then, Jesenia suspects her ex Melvin molested their daughter, but Melvin maintains his innocence!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Wait! Don’t Read the Results Yet Steve…
programme.desc: Sharina thinks that Clarence is cheating on her because he’s always staying out late. Plus, Chrystal doesn’t want Earnie’s ex Tenyia to stay with them just because she’s the mother of his child. Is he also cheating on her?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Why Aren't You A Father
programme.desc: Jeremy hasn't seen his child in four years, but after coming clean, he wants to right the wrongs that he's done. Julie, his ex and mother of their child, doesn't buy it, claiming that he spends more time with his new girlfriends child than his own.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You're Certain He's The Father?/Why Didn't You Tell Me?
programme.desc: Grace wants to expose ex-boyfriend Kenny for destroying her teen years and denying their child. Then, Kendra suspects boyfriend Brandon is cheating on her with his ex Monique, and she thinks he has the STD to prove it!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Will These Results Destroy Us
programme.desc: Christopher had to move away for a job and his wife, Ashley, says that she won't move until he proves that he's not a cheater. Then, Tim is worried that his wife Sasha is cheating because he found Facebook messages from her ex.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Dad, Did You Murder Our Mom?
programme.desc: After Juanita’s mother was murdered, things became strange, especially when her father Eric didn’t attend the funeral. She believes he was involved in the murder, but her sister Nora thinks she’s crazy. Can Steve help put this mystery to bed?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: It’s Been 8 Years, Tell the Truth!
programme.desc: Chante’s daughter accused Danae of sexual abuse. Although Danae was cleared by the authorities, Chante’s mother Shelly never believed her innocence. But is Danae just covering up for her own lies? Did Chante’s mother sleep with her ex-husband?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Did He Abuse My Son?
programme.desc: Heather is 17 years old and she says her boyfriend Anthony is the father of her child. But Anthony thinks his brother, Tracy is the father. Then, Roxana believes her two-year-old nephew was beaten by his mother Kyesha.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Teen Girls In Trouble
programme.desc: Dorothy is 17 years old and has felt so uncomfortable living at home with her mom and stepdad, that she has resorted to selling her body to take care of herself. Then, Connie says her ex pressured her to get pregnant at 16 and then refused to help her support their child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Do Not Touch Her on My Stage
programme.desc: Scott and Dawn want their sister Betty to leave her abusive boyfriend Michael of 11 months. Michael says Betty abuses him, too, but Scott and Dawn don’t believe him. The drama will explode when Scott confronts Michael on our stage today!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve is Speechless
programme.desc: Nykki, Jayda, Tammy and Pamela are here because Larry has fathered children with them. They say Larry not only an abusive deadbeat, but also engages in drugs, alcohol and pimps some of them out. Don’t miss the drama today!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Need Answers Now
programme.desc: Amanda is here because she's trying to save her marriage to Bo. Bo's not sure if he's the father of her child and needs a DNA test to prove the truth. Plus, Julie says that she believes she's being cheated on by Stevie.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Accusers Turned Abusers
programme.desc: Katrina is fed up with her boyfriend Ismael's abusive and controlling ways. Katrina says Ismael acts this way because he believes she has been cheating. Then, Christie has been married to Chris for 8 months and he already suspects her infidelity.
